metadata.description: It's a big turning point for Astra Furst, the third-generation super hero of Astro City. It's a time of friends and family, new opportunities, new dangers, and changing relationships in a two-part special featuring the First Family, the creatures of Monstro City, a new hero team, and more in a graduation night nobody's ever going to forget.
metadata.name: Astro City: Astra
